title: Anhe Zhuan
overview: An He, the world's most mysterious assassin organization, consists of the 3 names of the Su, Xie, and Mu Families. Everyone was poisoned, and their lives were at stake. After learning the news, the 3 powers of the An He family took the opportunity to launch a rebellion. Su Muyu, as the leader of the Shadow Spider Guardian group, brought Bai Hehuai, the genius doctor of the Medicine King Valley, to heal the elders, while repelling the assassins and protecting the elder Zhouquan. At this time, his friend Su Changhe in An He, but on behalf of the Su Family joined the operation to kill the patriarch.
